title: RealMan Robotics open-sources its RealSource robot dataset
description:
The dataset is built from 10 real-world simulated environments in RealMan's Beijing Humanoid Robot Data Training Center.

The post RealMan Robotics open-sources its RealSource robot dataset appeared first on The Robot Report.
